name: Chronicles (chinese)
description: Chinese translation of Heroes Chronicles. Requires the chronicles mod or the chronicles h3c files in the maps folder. Rename to: c1-underworld.h3c   c2-elements.h3c   c3-dragon.h3c   c4-wasteland.h3c   c5-tree.h3c   c6-moon.h3c   c7-beastmasters.h3c   c8-frost.h3c

chinese.name: 编年史（中文)
chinese.description: 英雄编年史》的中文翻译。需要Chronicles mod或地图文件夹中的Chronicles h3c文件。重命名为： c1-underworld.h3c   c2-elements.h3c   c3-dragon.h3c   c4-wasteland.h3c   c5-tree.h3c   c6-moon.h3c   c7-beastmasters.h3c   c8-frost.h3c
